product_name: Light & Motion Vis 360 Front and Rear Helmet Bike Light System
long_description: The Light & Motion Vis 360deg is a remarkable new commuter bike light system that delivers a full 360 degrees of visibility and easily snaps on and off your helmet. Offers 110 lumens of brightness to the front and an impressive 4 lumens of red to the back; directional amber side markers on both the front and rear lights enhance visibility. Long-lasting, lightweight rechargeable lithium ion battery charges in 4.5 hrs. Micro USB port accepts charging from most 2010 cell phone chargers or any USB port. Easily fits all helmet styles; it's so lightweight, you'll barely notice it on your head.
